definition: Steve Jobs (1955-2011), US co-founder and CEO of Apple, Inc.

definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
